Soul of the Lost Sinner, prisoner of Sinner's Rise.
The Lost Sinner eternally punishes herself for the sins of her past.
The mask description states:
Mask of the Lost Sinner. The spikes pointing inward suggest that this was not only used to blind prisoners, but to torture them as well.
So it's clear she's punishing herself for something.
